00009 #if !defined(Auxiliary_TypeOfAddress_hpp) 
00010 #define Auxiliary_TypeOfAddress_hpp
00011 
00012 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00013 #include <Auxiliary/BitField.hpp>
00014 
00015 
00016 /*  ========================================================================
00017     Type-of-Address (TON/NPI) - 3GPP TS 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.3.9]
00018     ========================================================================*/
00020 class TypeOfAddress {
00021     public:
00022         // marks the invalidity of the protocol-identifier
00023         enum {
00025             InvalidTypeOfAddress = 0x00
00026         };
00027 
00029         enum TypeOfNumber { // do not change order
00031             UnknownTypeOfNumber = 0,
00033             InternationalNumber,
00035             NationalNumber,
00037             NetworkSpecificNumber,
00039             SubscriberNumber,
00041             Alphanumeric,
00043             AbbreviatedNumber,
00045             ReservedTypeOfNumber,
00047             InvalidTypeOfNumber
00048         };
00049 
00051         enum NumberingPlanIdentification {
00053             UnknownNumberingPlan,
00055             TelephoneNumberingPlan,
00057             DataNumberingPlan,
00059             TelexNumberingPlan,
00061             ServiceCentreSpecificPlan,
00063             NationalNumberingPlan,
00065             PrivateNumberingPlan,
00067             ErmesNumberingPlan,
00069             ReservedNumberingPlan,
00071             InvalidNumberingPlan,
00072         };
00073 
00075         TypeOfAddress();
00077         TypeOfAddress(UINT8 incoming_byte);
00078 
00080         UINT8 Get() const { return (m_bit_field.Get()); }
00081 
00083         TypeOfNumber GetTypeOfNumber() const;
00085         void SetTypeOfNumber(TypeOfNumber type_of_number);
00086 
00088         NumberingPlanIdentification GetNumberingPlanIdentification() const;
00090         void SetNumberingPlanIdentification(NumberingPlanIdentification numbering_plan_identification);
00091 
00093         BOOLEAN Is3aExisting() const {          
00094             return (! m_bit_field.GetBit(7));
00095         }   
00097         void Set3aNotExists() {
00098             m_bit_field.SetTrue(7);
00099         }
00101         void Set3aExists() {
00102             m_bit_field.SetFalse(7);
00103         }
00104 
00106         void Clear() { m_bit_field.Set(InvalidTypeOfAddress); }
00107 
00108     private:
00109         BitField8 m_bit_field;
00110 };
00111 
00112 
00113 #endif  // Auxiliary_TypeOfAddress_hpp
